alert.note: Alert for Calabasas and Agoura Hills; Central Ventura County Valleys; Cuyama Valley; Lake Casitas; Los Angeles County Beaches; Los Angeles County Inland Coast including Downtown Los Angeles; Los Angeles County San Gabriel Valley; Ojai Valley; Palos Verdes Hills; San Luis Obispo County Mountains; Santa Barbara County Central Coast Beaches; Santa Barbara County Inland Central Coast; Santa Barbara County Southeastern Coast; Santa Ynez Valley; Southeastern Ventura County Valleys; Ventura County Beaches; Ventura County Inland Coast (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 11 at 3:35AM PST until January 11 at 12:00PM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL NOON PST TODAY... * WHAT...Northwest winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 40 to 50 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of southwest California. * WHEN...Until noon PST today. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
